proposes.from sentence: Aiming to automatically extract aspects from the text efficiently and analyze the sentiment polarity of aspects simultaneously , this paper proposes a multi-task learning model for aspect - based sentiment analysis .

LCF - ATEPC 3 model.is: novel multilingual and multi-task - oriented model
LCF - ATEPC 3 model.from sentence: The LCF - ATEPC 3 model proposed in this paper is a novel multilingual and multi-task - oriented model .

integrates.from sentence: The proposed model is based on multi-head self - attention ( MHSA ) and integrates the pre-trained and the local context focus mechanism , namely LCF - ATEPC .

training on.from sentence: By training on a small amount of annotated data of aspect and their polarity , the model can be adapted to a large - scale dataset , automatically extracting the aspects and predicting the sentiment polarities .
